title: FM Jilani, Mongolian Deputy PM discuss bilateral ties
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 04 (APP): Caretaker Foreign Minister Jalil Abbas Jilani on Wednesday held a fruitful meeting with Deputy Prime Minister Sainbuyan of Mongolia in Tibet.
The two countries agreed to further deepen mutually beneficial Pakistan-Mongolia relationship, deepen trade and economic cooperation specially in the field of mining, agriculture and textile, Foreign Office Spokesperson posted on X.
https://x.com/ForeignOfficePk/status/1709582799567811061?s=20
